snippet: There are plenty of apps that help you take better pictures with your phone, or even with your regular camera.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares mobile photo applications; recommends Roxie Keyboard app, which predicts kind of emoji one may like to add into a text.
lead_paragraph: There are plenty of apps that help you take better pictures with your phone, or even with your regular camera.

headline.print_headline: Smartphone Photography Gets a Human Touch
headline.main: Smartphone Photography Evolves With Camera Apps and Related Tools
